You are a restless corpse driven by revengeâ€”or some other matter for which you would give up eternity. You gain the following benefits:

Death Offers No Rest. A year and one day after obtaining this gift, or once you complete your Destiny, you are doomed. Until then you gain the following benefits: 

  • If you are below half your hit point maximum at the start of your turn, you regain 1 hit point. However, when you spend hit dice during a short rest, you only recover half as many hit points as normal.

  • If you die, you return to "life" 24 hours after death. If your body is destroyed, you reform within 1 mile of the place of your death at a spot determined by the Narrator, possibly by requisitioning an unused corpse. If your equipment was also destroyed, you do not regain it.
